content: poop on fascists the liberty of a democracy is not safe if the people tolerate the growth of private power to a point where it becomes stronger than the democratic state itself that in its essence is fascism ownership of government by an individual by a group or any controlling private power franklin delano roosevelt message to congress 29 april 1938 poop on fascists hat 2 yarn 💩 notes sport weight yarn in the following to avoid jogs uneven stripes at the beginning of quantities rounds i use this jogless join method main colour natural 95 m/104 yards because chart 2 is so wide it has been split into 3 contrast colour 1 blue 65 m/71 yards parts when you get to these charts start with round contrast colour 2 bronze 27 m/30 yards 1 of chart 2a followed by round 1 of chart 2b and then round 1 of chart 2c continue as established the sample hat was knitted in rauma until you have completed round 16 of all charts finullgarn 175 m/50 g if you would rather poop on putin or poop on trump these alternative charts are included on needles page 3 3 mm / us 2 5 circular needle 50 cm on rnds 8 and 9 of chart 2b there are very long 3 mm / us 2 5 double-pointed needles cc1 sections rather than make floats over these sts i broke mc and reattached it after knitting cc1 gauge 15 sts x 16 row = 5 cm/2 over chart 2a 💩 instructions with cc1 cast on 140 sts place marker and join finished measurements in a round work chart 1 around increasing 4 sts height 23 cm/9 evenly spaced on round 12 marked with ★ on the circumference 51cm/20 chart = 144 sts the hat will fit a 56cm/22 head then work chart 2a + chart 2b + chart 2c then work chart 3 around = 12 sts after round 46 abbreviations draw up rem sts cc1 contrast colour 1 cc2 contrast colour 2 weave in ends block increase increase k knit if desired add a tassel or pompon k2tog knit 2 stitches together mc main colour p purl rem remain repeat repeat round round st s stitch es this pattern is available for free to support me please follow me on instagram join my ravelry group or subscribe to my newsletter happy knitting instagram tynn_traad ravelry group newnorwegian newsletter jagged lines © lanja khon-engheim 2025 poop on fascists hat 3 © lanja khon-engheim 2025 / 54 / 51 / 34 31 / cm 14 11 1cc 93 / 9 2cc 73 7 lrup - 53 / 5 got2k / 33 3 decaps ylneve sts 4 cni ★ 13 / 1 dnr siht no pmurt no poop - 2 trahc tla 92
